content.text: Mar Baselios Public School
About the school
Mar Baselios Public School is located in Manganam, near Devalokam in Kottayam,
Kerala. Established in 2001 and affiliated with the Central Board of Secondary
Education (CBSE), New Delhi, it offers co-educational learning from kindergarten
to senior secondary levels. The school's motto—"You are the light of the world" (St. Matthew 5:14)—reflects its mission to guide students toward academic
excellence, moral integrity, compassion, and social awareness. Set across a
serene 7.5-acre campus surrounded by lush greenery, the school provides a
peaceful, eco-friendly environment ideal for personal and intellectual growth. Mar

Baselios believes education extends beyond the classroom—it's about building character, cultivating empathy, and shaping responsible citizens. The institution blends traditional values with modern education, preparing students spiritually, emotionally, and intellectually for future challenges. The school offers a
comprehensive CBSE curriculum grounded in innovation and creativity. Highly
qualified teachers encourage students to think critically, question fearlessly, and
explore knowledge beyond textbooks. Mar Baselios places equal emphasis on co-
curricular and extracurricular activities—including sports, performing arts, fine arts, music, dance, and yoga. These programs develop teamwork, leadership,
creativity, and self-confidence—all essential qualities for success. The school
regularly hosts inter-school competitions, science and art exhibitions, seminars, and cultural events where students showcase their talents. The admission process
upholds merit and fairness through entrance tests for classes above Grade II and
a selection procedure for Grade XI that includes interviews and board exam
evaluations.
Location
The campus is located near Kanjikuzhi–Kollad Road in Devalokam, Kanjikuzhi, Kottayam, within walking distance of Devalokam Catholicate Aramana.

Academic structure
According to the National Education Policy 2020, the new education system will
follow a 5+3+3+4 education system where the students will spend 5 years in
strengthening their foundation, 3 years in the preparatory stage, 3 years in the middle stage and rest 4 years in the secondary stage.
Eurokids
MBPS has two groups in our preschool:
Play group (2–3 years old)
Nursery (3–4 years old)
With our "Child's First" philosophy, everything at Eurokids centers on young
learners—from our research-based curriculum to scientifically proven, age-
appropriate learning activities. Through early childhood programs, children develop lasting academic, social, and life skills.
Mar Baselios Public School
Research from Harvard University shows that 90% of a child's brain development occurs from birth to age 5. This foundational age requires the right stimulus for
holistic growth.
Eurokids Mar Baselios has nurtured young minds to be creative and independent since 2006. Over these 18 years, we've served more than 760 students who have graduated from our center.

Facilities
Computer lab

The school has two fully equipped computer laboratories that provide students with ample opportunities for practical learning in the field of computer science. Each lab is furnished with modern computers, high-speed internet connectivity, and updated software to support various learning activities such as coding, digital
design, and data analysis. These labs enable students to apply theoretical
concepts through hands-on practice, thereby enhancing their technological skills
Mar Baselios Public School
and digital literacy. Regular practical sessions are conducted to help students stay updated with current advancements in technology and to prepare them for future
academic and professional pursuits in the digital world.
Robotics lab
The school has a full-fledged Atal Tinkering Lab (ATL) Robotics Lab, established
with the aid and support granted by NITI Aayog, Government of India. The lab is
designed to promote innovation, creativity, and hands-on learning among students
by providing them access to advanced tools and technologies such as robotics kits, sensors, 3D printers, and microcontrollers. It serves as a dynamic space
where students can experiment, design prototypes, and develop problem-solving
skills through practical application of STEM concepts. The ATL Robotics Lab
encourages curiosity, teamwork, and innovation, preparing students to become future-ready thinkers and innovators.
Science labs
The school has three well-established science laboratories, each dedicated to one
of the core science subjects:- Physics, Chemistry, and Biology. Every lab is
spacious, well-ventilated, and equipped with modern instruments, tools, and
safety equipment necessary for conducting experiments and demonstrations. These laboratories provide students with valuable hands-on learning experiences
that complement theoretical lessons taught in the classroom. By performing
practical activities and observations, students develop scientific skills such as critical thinking, experimentation, and analysis, fostering a deeper understanding
and appreciation of scientific principles.
Psychology lab
The Psychology lab of the school is well-equipped to facilitate effective teaching
and learning of the subject. It provides students with opportunities to engage in practical sessions that complement theoretical knowledge. The lab contains
various psychological testing tools, apparatus, and materials that enable students
to conduct experiments, administer assessments, and observe behavioral
Mar Baselios Public School
patterns. Through these hands-on activities, students develop a deeper
understanding of psychological concepts and gain essential skills in analysis,
observation, and interpretation, thereby strengthening their overall learning experience..
Library

reference, project work and board games. We are passionate about reading and

committed to making our students, readers for life. There are books to suit all age groups in English, Malayalam, Hindi and even a few in French . We subscribe to a variety of newspapers and periodicals . Our 'guided home-reading scheme' helps students to read at least 20-30 books every year, which is a special feature of the school.
Transportation

Events
Annual day
The Annual Day is one of the most eagerly awaited events in a school’s calendar. It is a celebration of talent, creativity, and achievement, bringing together
students, teachers, and parents. The program usually begins with a welcome
address and lighting of the lamp, followed by cultural performances like dances, songs, skits, and speeches. The day reflects the school’s spirit of unity, teamwork,
and excellence, making it a memorable occasion for everyone.
Mar Baselios Public School
Sarang
Sarang is a vibrant and highly anticipated cultural program that takes place
between the four houses of our school. This exciting event serves as a platform to

encourage teamwork, foster healthy competition, and build camaraderie among students from different grades. Sarang celebrates the rich diversity of Indian art and culture by providing students with a gateway to showcase their talents across
many traditional and contemporary art forms present in our country, including
classical dance, music, drama, recitation, and mime. Through enthusiastic
participation and creative expression, students not only develop their artistic
abilities but also gain confidence, leadership skills, and a deeper appreciation for
India's cultural heritage. The event culminates in an awards ceremony recognizing
outstanding performances, making Sarang a truly memorable and enriching
experience for all participants.
Meraki
Meraki is a prestigious inter-school cultural and competitive program organized
annually by the senior students of Classes XI and XII at our school. This
distinguished event serves as a dynamic platform that empowers students to showcase their diverse talents, skills, and creativity through rigorous yet healthy
competition. Meraki has earned recognition for bringing together educational institutions from across Kerala, fostering inter-school collaboration, cultural

exchange, and academic excellence. The program features a comprehensive array of competitive events, including eloquent debate competitions that test critical thinking and oratory skills, captivating dance performances that celebrate
artistic expression, and challenging Best Management Team competitions that
evaluate strategic planning and leadership capabilities. Through Meraki, students
not only demonstrate their individual and collective talents but also develop
essential life skills such as teamwork, confidence, time management, and the ability to perform under pressure, making it one of the most enriching and
anticipated events in our school's academic calendar.
Sports day
Sports Day is an exciting inter-house athletic competition held annually at our school, bringing together students from all houses to compete in a spirit of
Mar Baselios Public School

friendly rivalry and camaraderie. The event kicks off with an impressive march past, where students proudly represent their respective houses in a disciplined procession. This is followed by a wide array of track and field events that

showcase athletic talent and determination, including sprinting events like the 100-meter dash, field events such as long jump and shot put, and team-based relay races that require coordination and speed. Throughout the day, students demonstrate dedication, perseverance, and competitive spirit while cheering for
their teammates and celebrating each other's achievements. Sports Day plays a
vital role in promoting healthy sportsmanship, physical fitness, teamwork,
leadership qualities, and house unity among students, making it one of the most
memorable and energizing events of the school calendar.
Baselian trophy
The basketball tournament was one of the most thrilling events of the year, filled with energy, excitement, and team spirit. The competition began with an
enthusiastic opening ceremony where the teams were introduced. Baselian trophy
is a basketball tournament hosted in our school annually. It brings together
schools from nearby area to participate and compete with each other. The winner
takes it all and is awarded with the Baselian trophy.
Workshops
Our school hosts many interactive workshop sessions throughout the year to
provide students with valuable practical knowledge and real-world experience. These sessions facilitate creativity, problem-solving skills, and innovation among

participants. They also contribute significantly to helping students understand modern technology, digital tools, and emerging trends in a practical, hands-on way. Through expert-led demonstrations, collaborative activities, and interactive
learning experiences, students gain confidence and competence in applying
theoretical concepts to real-life situations.

detail.text: Mar Baselios Public School
About the school
Mar Baselios Public School is located in Manganam, near Devalokam in Kottayam,
Kerala. Established in 2001 and affiliated with the Central Board of Secondary
Education (CBSE), New Delhi, it offers co-educational learning from kindergarten
to senior secondary levels. The school's motto—"You are the light of the world" (St. Matthew 5:14)—reflects its mission to guide students toward academic
excellence, moral integrity, compassion, and social awareness. Set across a
serene 7.5-acre campus surrounded by lush greenery, the school provides a
peaceful, eco-friendly environment ideal for personal and intellectual growth. Mar

Baselios believes education extends beyond the classroom—it's about building character, cultivating empathy, and shaping responsible citizens. The institution blends traditional values with modern education, preparing students spiritually, emotionally, and intellectually for future challenges. The school offers a
comprehensive CBSE curriculum grounded in innovation and creativity. Highly
qualified teachers encourage students to think critically, question fearlessly, and
explore knowledge beyond textbooks. Mar Baselios places equal emphasis on co-
curricular and extracurricular activities—including sports, performing arts, fine arts, music, dance, and yoga. These programs develop teamwork, leadership,
creativity, and self-confidence—all essential qualities for success. The school
regularly hosts inter-school competitions, science and art exhibitions, seminars, and cultural events where students showcase their talents. The admission process
upholds merit and fairness through entrance tests for classes above Grade II and
a selection procedure for Grade XI that includes interviews and board exam
evaluations.
Location
The campus is located near Kanjikuzhi–Kollad Road in Devalokam, Kanjikuzhi, Kottayam, within walking distance of Devalokam Catholicate Aramana.
Address
Mar Baselios Public School
Mar Baselios Public School, Manganam P.O, Near Devalokam, Kottayam-18, Kerala, India.

Monday - Friday. .8.30 am to 4.00 pm Saturday 9.00 am to 12.30 pm
Second Saturday is a holiday
Phone Number

Academic structure
According to the National Education Policy 2020, the new education system will
follow a 5+3+3+4 education system where the students will spend 5 years in
strengthening their foundation, 3 years in the preparatory stage, 3 years in the middle stage and rest 4 years in the secondary stage.
Eurokids
MBPS has two groups in our preschool:
Play group (2–3 years old)
Nursery (3–4 years old)
With our "Child's First" philosophy, everything at Eurokids centers on young
learners—from our research-based curriculum to scientifically proven, age-
appropriate learning activities. Through early childhood programs, children develop lasting academic, social, and life skills.
Mar Baselios Public School
Research from Harvard University shows that 90% of a child's brain development occurs from birth to age 5. This foundational age requires the right stimulus for
holistic growth.
Eurokids Mar Baselios has nurtured young minds to be creative and independent since 2006. Over these 18 years, we've served more than 760 students who have graduated from our center.

Student Council Members
Every year, the teachers choose candidates for the positions of Head Boy, Head
Girl and Sports Captain from class XI. All those who were chosen, run for the
elections for their respective roles. All students can vote for one person from each

position. The ones who wins the election will be chosen for the respective role. This unique form of choosing the student council members is only done in our school and leads to all the students feeling more involved and connected with the
working of the school.

Facilities
Computer lab

The school has two fully equipped computer laboratories that provide students with ample opportunities for practical learning in the field of computer science. Each lab is furnished with modern computers, high-speed internet connectivity, and updated software to support various learning activities such as coding, digital
design, and data analysis. These labs enable students to apply theoretical
concepts through hands-on practice, thereby enhancing their technological skills
Mar Baselios Public School
and digital literacy. Regular practical sessions are conducted to help students stay updated with current advancements in technology and to prepare them for future
academic and professional pursuits in the digital world.
Robotics lab
The school has a full-fledged Atal Tinkering Lab (ATL) Robotics Lab, established
with the aid and support granted by NITI Aayog, Government of India. The lab is
designed to promote innovation, creativity, and hands-on learning among students
by providing them access to advanced tools and technologies such as robotics kits, sensors, 3D printers, and microcontrollers. It serves as a dynamic space
where students can experiment, design prototypes, and develop problem-solving
skills through practical application of STEM concepts. The ATL Robotics Lab
encourages curiosity, teamwork, and innovation, preparing students to become future-ready thinkers and innovators.
Science labs
The school has three well-established science laboratories, each dedicated to one
of the core science subjects:- Physics, Chemistry, and Biology. Every lab is
spacious, well-ventilated, and equipped with modern instruments, tools, and
safety equipment necessary for conducting experiments and demonstrations. These laboratories provide students with valuable hands-on learning experiences
that complement theoretical lessons taught in the classroom. By performing
practical activities and observations, students develop scientific skills such as critical thinking, experimentation, and analysis, fostering a deeper understanding
and appreciation of scientific principles.
Psychology lab
The Psychology lab of the school is well-equipped to facilitate effective teaching
and learning of the subject. It provides students with opportunities to engage in practical sessions that complement theoretical knowledge. The lab contains
various psychological testing tools, apparatus, and materials that enable students
to conduct experiments, administer assessments, and observe behavioral
Mar Baselios Public School
patterns. Through these hands-on activities, students develop a deeper
understanding of psychological concepts and gain essential skills in analysis,
observation, and interpretation, thereby strengthening their overall learning experience..
Library
The MBPS library is a dynamic zone where students can engage in reading,
reference, project work and board games. We are passionate about reading and

committed to making our students, readers for life. There are books to suit all age groups in English, Malayalam, Hindi and even a few in French . We subscribe to a variety of newspapers and periodicals . Our 'guided home-reading scheme' helps students to read at least 20-30 books every year, which is a special feature of the school.
Transportation
The school operates a fleet of 17 well-maintained buses that cover all major routes
to ensure safe and convenient transportation for students. Each bus is equipped with necessary safety features and is regularly inspected to maintain high
standards of reliability and cleanliness. Experienced drivers and trained support staff are assigned to every bus to assist and supervise students during their

journey, ensuring discipline and comfort throughout the commute. The school’s transport system prioritizes punctuality, safety, and care, providing parents with confidence and peace of mind regarding their children’s travel to and from school.

Admission Process
Admission Form Admission Guidelines
Parents should enquire for the admission forms & availability of seats at the
school front
office, in advance, to avoid inconvenience.
Admission form and Prospectus (LKG to Class IX) will be available at the
School office on
payment of Rs.500/- for L.K.G to Std IX & Rs.550/- for Std XI (Non-Refundable).
Detailed information about the dates of submission of forms, entrance test, result
declaration, interaction with parent and student and appointment dates will be
available
from the school front office. There will be no entrance test for admissions to
L.K.G, U.K.G
& Std I.
Decision by the Management will be final regarding Selection & Admission. Mere registration does not guarantee admission.
No recommendations will be entertained.
NOTE: ADMISSION FORMS WILL ONLY BE AVAILABLE ACCORDING TO THE AVAILABILITY
OF SEATS.

Affidavit or Certificate from a Hospital will not be accepted. Information given
in the

Half
yearly).

of

Criteria for Admission to Class XI
Minimum 75% marks in Class X Board Examination.
Candidate must fulfill all requirements mandated by CBSE.
Personal interview of the candidate and parents will be conducted. Admission test is mandatory for candidates seeking admission before Board
Exam results are declared.
Upon selection, candidates must submit Mark List, Transfer Certificate, Conduct Certificate, Birth Certificate, and Migration Certificate (if applicable).

Events
Annual day
The Annual Day is one of the most eagerly awaited events in a school’s calendar. It is a celebration of talent, creativity, and achievement, bringing together
students, teachers, and parents. The program usually begins with a welcome
address and lighting of the lamp, followed by cultural performances like dances, songs, skits, and speeches. The day reflects the school’s spirit of unity, teamwork,
and excellence, making it a memorable occasion for everyone.
Mar Baselios Public School
Sarang
Sarang is a vibrant and highly anticipated cultural program that takes place
between the four houses of our school. This exciting event serves as a platform to

encourage teamwork, foster healthy competition, and build camaraderie among students from different grades. Sarang celebrates the rich diversity of Indian art and culture by providing students with a gateway to showcase their talents across
many traditional and contemporary art forms present in our country, including
classical dance, music, drama, recitation, and mime. Through enthusiastic
participation and creative expression, students not only develop their artistic
abilities but also gain confidence, leadership skills, and a deeper appreciation for
India's cultural heritage. The event culminates in an awards ceremony recognizing
outstanding performances, making Sarang a truly memorable and enriching
experience for all participants.
Meraki
Meraki is a prestigious inter-school cultural and competitive program organized
annually by the senior students of Classes XI and XII at our school. This
distinguished event serves as a dynamic platform that empowers students to showcase their diverse talents, skills, and creativity through rigorous yet healthy
competition. Meraki has earned recognition for bringing together educational institutions from across Kerala, fostering inter-school collaboration, cultural

exchange, and academic excellence. The program features a comprehensive array of competitive events, including eloquent debate competitions that test critical thinking and oratory skills, captivating dance performances that celebrate
artistic expression, and challenging Best Management Team competitions that
evaluate strategic planning and leadership capabilities. Through Meraki, students
not only demonstrate their individual and collective talents but also develop
essential life skills such as teamwork, confidence, time management, and the ability to perform under pressure, making it one of the most enriching and
anticipated events in our school's academic calendar.
Sports day
Sports Day is an exciting inter-house athletic competition held annually at our school, bringing together students from all houses to compete in a spirit of
Mar Baselios Public School

friendly rivalry and camaraderie. The event kicks off with an impressive march past, where students proudly represent their respective houses in a disciplined procession. This is followed by a wide array of track and field events that

showcase athletic talent and determination, including sprinting events like the 100-meter dash, field events such as long jump and shot put, and team-based relay races that require coordination and speed. Throughout the day, students demonstrate dedication, perseverance, and competitive spirit while cheering for
their teammates and celebrating each other's achievements. Sports Day plays a
vital role in promoting healthy sportsmanship, physical fitness, teamwork,
leadership qualities, and house unity among students, making it one of the most
memorable and energizing events of the school calendar.
Baselian trophy
The basketball tournament was one of the most thrilling events of the year, filled with energy, excitement, and team spirit. The competition began with an
enthusiastic opening ceremony where the teams were introduced. Baselian trophy
is a basketball tournament hosted in our school annually. It brings together
schools from nearby area to participate and compete with each other. The winner
takes it all and is awarded with the Baselian trophy.
Workshops
Our school hosts many interactive workshop sessions throughout the year to
provide students with valuable practical knowledge and real-world experience. These sessions facilitate creativity, problem-solving skills, and innovation among

participants. They also contribute significantly to helping students understand modern technology, digital tools, and emerging trends in a practical, hands-on way. Through expert-led demonstrations, collaborative activities, and interactive
learning experiences, students gain confidence and competence in applying
theoretical concepts to real-life situations.
